participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.
I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others.
i work as an electrician.
my father was a famous actor.
i like listening to all genres of music except country music.

participant_2.background:
I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
I was forced to flee my home country and start a new life in a foreign land.
I love to lift weights and enjoy simpler things in life.
i love to read crime novels.
i like to drive for hours.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
Hi there! I love to take my iPhone to festivals and capture the best moments.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a festival before. What's it like?
It's so much fun! There's always so much energy and excitement in the air. And the music is always amazing.
That sounds like something I would really enjoy. Maybe I'll have to check out a festival sometime soon.
I definitely recommend it! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy performing on stage. It's a great way to express myself and connect with others.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try performing on stage, but I'm not sure if I would be any good at it.
You should definitely give it a try! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to meet new people.
I might just do that! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to read crime novels. I find them so suspenseful and exciting.
Me too! I love the feeling of being on the edge of my seat when I'm reading a crime novel.
Exactly! It's the best feeling.
So, what's your favorite crime novel?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Girl on the Train by Paula Hawkins.
That's a great book! I loved it too.
Me too! It was so suspenseful and twisty.
It was! I couldn't put it down.
Me neither!
So, what are you reading now?
I'm reading The Silent Patient by Alex Michaelides. It's really good so far.
Oh, I've heard good things about that book. I might have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's a great read.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it.
Me too
